abstract: Among the Hollywood developers scrambling to create original Internet programs, Michael Eisner is one of the very few who can claim early success.
snippet: Among the Hollywood developers scrambling to create original Internet programs, Michael Eisner is one of the very few who can claim early success.
lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES  When Michael D. Eisner left the Walt Disney Company in 2005 and set about remaking himself in new media, investing in a video-sharing Web site and starting a digital studio, some people in Hollywood snickered. Here we go, the whispers went, another fading star who doesn’t know when to leave the stage.

headline.main: The Very Model of a Modern Media Mogul
